                     int startTime,

        Parameters:
        title - title of Event
        meetingDays - meeting days of Event
        startTime - start time of Event
        endTime - end time of Event
        weeklyRepeat - weekly repeat of Event
        eventDetails - event details of Event
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if a duplicate of the activity is found in the schedule.
